attributes.action: allow anyone to travel anywhere in the uk for £5 per week
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As we all know, much of the bus, tube, and railways networks are the worst in the world for varying reasons ranging from: over crowding, lack of investment, expensive fares, awful political decision makers, and profiteering multi-national companies.

A simple solution to this problem is to tax everyone £5 per week, but allow anyone to travel anywhere in the mainland UK for free by these modes of transport.

This would work providing the government re-nationalizes the whole network, plus it would automatically free traffic from our congested roads by allowing the coaches and buses to run fast and freely.

Half price reductions for: pensioners, students and the unemployed.
Kids go free only when accompanied by an adult.

By my estimate, this would generate 10.4 billion pounds per year from 40 million working paying citizens.
